article_title: Play “Would You Survive ‘Game of Thrones?’” where nobody comes out alive
article_text:
Topics: a song of ice and fire, Death, Fantasy, Fiction, Game of Thrones, George RR Martin, Entertainment News

If you’re from any of the fabled lands in “A Song of Ice and Fire,” you will die. Even if you’re a real person, written into the fictional realm — you will die. This is, of course, because in “Game of Thrones,” all men must die. So then the question is not whether you will die, but how and when.

To determine the source of your pain, Dorkly has created this handy flowchart. Eventually, the White Walkers will get us all.

h/t AV Club

article_metadata.description: You would die, but the question is: how?
